name: Please Stand By -I Got Something To Say 120
description:
Please Stand By utilizes the iconic SMPTE color bars template and changes the palette to bring into question viewers perceptions surrounding "standards of color." An offshoot of my original series, I Got Something To Say, adds an additional more literal message. Please Stand By, Democracy Is Under Attack. On Jan 6th 2021 a group of insurrections fueled by lies repeated by then President Trump attacked the capitol & threatened our democracy.
Due to the fact that this attack has been attempted to be painted as a peaceful protest by the right I've added sounds from that day of the rioters to amplify the severity and realness of what happened. I've also included a link below of a short documentary produced by the NY Times that  I believe should be required viewing for all future High School Students, because if we don't learn from this fiasco it may just be the beginning of something much worse. Please I urge everyone to check it out.
https://www.nytimes.com/video/us/politics/100000007606996/capitol-riot-trump-supporters.html
